categories: Category:LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures

nodes.text: "A New Home" is the first episode of the second season of LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures. It was released on Disney XD on June 17, 2017. The episode is a collection of the five short films "Home One", "Thrown Into Battle", "Rowan's Secret Adventure", "Zander Freemaker, Superstar Pilot Guy!", and "Beware, the Gamorrean Flu!".
New to Home One, the Freemakers embark on a series of misadventures to assist and maybe even impress the rebel fleet.

To secure a job with the Rebel Alliance, the Freemakers travel throughout the galaxy to obtain a Type A vector coil. Kordi Freemaker uses her bartering skills to obtain the vector coil for Lieutenant Valeria's U-wing starfighter.

Following a botched attempt to befriend the local droids aboard the MC80A Home One Type Heavy Star Cruiser Home One, Roger builds a buffer. He becomes an unlikely hero when he accidentally knocks out the deflector shield generator of an Imperial Star Destroyer.

After accidentally damaging Blue Squadron's starfighters, Rowan Freemaker and Roger hastily rebuild the ships. They become unintentional passengers aboard Lieutenant Valeria's Y-wing during the assault on Strike Station Aurek.

Zander Freemaker attempts to join Valeria's Blue Squadron in his own starfighter, the Blazemaker. He and his siblings stack the starfighter with too many laser cannons, causing it to explode at the end of the dogfight.

The Freemakers undertake a mission to rescue the rebel agents Lando Calrissian and Chewbacca, whose ship the Millennium Falcon is missing its fuel intermixer. They also encounter some old enemies in the form of the Imperial officers Durpin and Plumestriker.
